text: A decasecond is equal to ten seconds. It can be written mathematically as 101 seconds. * 2.7 decaseconds - half life of dubnium-261 * 3 decaseconds - half life of seaborgium-266 * 3 decaseconds - half life of Flerovium-289 * 3 decaseconds - normal amount of time that a TV commercial in the USA lasts * 3.1536 decaseconds - one brainly or 1/1000000th of a year * 3.4 decaseconds - half life of dubnium-262 * 6 decaseconds = one minute * 6.1 decaseconds - half life of rutherfordium-261 * 10 decaseconds = 1 minute 40 seconds Category:Orders of magnitude Category:Units of time
title: Decasecond
